name: SUMMER LAVENDER Moisturizer
description:
SUMMER LAVENDER MOISTURIZER
Our unique raw, cold processed formula combines the astringent properties of hazelnut oil and lavender to form a hydrating, light and mildly exfoliating cream for summertime.  Our own fresh botanical extracts of green tea and licorice deliver antioxidant properties and help regulate sebum production.  Vegan.

Ingredients:
Lavendula angustifolia (Lavender) Distillate, Aloe barbadensis (Aloe) Gel, Corylus avellana (Hazelnut) Oil, Theobroma grandiflorum Seed (Cupuacu) Butter, Citrus aurantium sinensis (Orange) Fiber ECOCERT, **Lecithin, Ricinis communis (Castor) Oil, Glycerine, *Maple Syrup Extract, Gluconolactone (and) Sodium Benzoate ECOCERT, **Camellia sinensis (Green Tea) Extract, **Glycyrrhiza glabra (Licorice) Extract, Tocopherols GMO free, *Lavendula angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, *Rosa damascena (Rose) Oil.

name: SUMMER LAVENDER Cleanser
description:
SUMMER LAVENDER CLEANSER
Safflower and avocado oils are sun infused with lavender to tone the skin while cleansing.  High altitude lavender essential oil acts as a gentle antiseptic.  Apply to a cotton pad moistened with Lavender Essence Toner.  Press and blot to remove dirt and makeup. Wipe excess with a tissue and follow with toner. Vegan.

INGREDIENTS:
**Carthamus tinctorius (Safflower) Oil infused with *Lavender, **Persea americana (Avocado) Oil, *Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Vitamin E, Rosemarinus officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, *Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Oil. 
 **Certified Organic, *Organic or wildcrafted.

name: SUMMER LAVENDER Toner
description:
SUMMER LAVENDER TONER
A mildly acidic toner made with distilled lavender, aloe vera gel, our own lavender flower essence and raw coconut vinegar to help balance the skinâ€™s pH during the summer. To be used after cleansing or anytime during the day for a refreshing skin drink.  Vegan.

INGREDIENTS:
Lavendula officinalis (Lavender) Distillate, Hamamelis virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate, Aloe barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Gel, Vegetable Glycerine, **Dehydrated Cane Juice, **Raw Coconut Vinegar, *Lavender Flower Essence.
 **Certified Organic, *Organic or wildcrafted.

name: SUMMER Skincare Kit
description:
SUMMER SKINCARE KIT
Summer is the season of combustion when plants experience accelerated growth toward the formation of their seeds. This internal combustion accelerates the growth of our skin cells as well.  Rapid cell growth can cause oiliness because old skin cells have not been sloughed off before new skin cells appear.  The astral lightness of lavender in all three products not only balances increased sebum production, but acts as a mild antiseptic and anti-microbial to help heal any resulting skin eruptions.

Kit includes:
*SUMMER LAVENDER Cleanser
*SUMMER LAVENDER Toner
*SUMMER LAVENDER Moisturizer
*Complimentary purse-sized moisturizer
*Sample of Parfums Lalun "New Moon"
